"This criminal has been expertly robbing store and leaving no trace. It is possible that this is not a simple petty thief and may even be an alien" Rook answered.

Suddenly Rook spotted movement near the store. A shadow moved towards the store from the woods at amazing speed. From the looks of it it appeared as though this figure was feminine. She climbed up the store wall with expert movement like a cat. With a shaky move of her butt she appeared on the top of the roof. Ben was very reluctant to go and just wanted to go back to sleep. "Ugh, fine lets go" Ben said.
